education_text.0: In 2000, Vilkomir moved to the Centre for Applied Formal Methods at      London South Bank University London South Bank University, becoming a Research Fellow thereIn 2000, Vilkomir moved to the Centre for Applied Formal Methods at      London South Bank University London South Bank University, becoming a Research Fellow thereVilkomir's main research contributions have been in the formalization of      Software testing software testingVilkomir was awarded the      Google Faculty Research Award for 2010Laboratory Schools
